participant_abstract.sent: We concretize the final product giving more explicit details about the specifications and target market.

participant_actions.sent: All the members should come up with a final solution.

participant_decisions.sent: Fancy look-and-feel is more important than functional look-and-feel.
A fruit shape (banana) would be trendy.
It should be easy to use.
Scroll buttons seem to be the optimal solution.
Remote location when device is lost.

participant_problems.sent: The budget keeps on being a tricky point, as it seems to me that the cost of the product will be higher than expected.
